participant_1.background:
I clean my glasses when I should be doing other things.
I lost my dog when I was 10 years old.
I am not sure what my ethnicity is, but I do know that I love jello.
my inspiration is classical music.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.

participant_2.background:
I love to play video games in the comfort of my home on a rainy day.
penn teller are my favorite magicians.
i work as a construction worker during the summers.
I miss my parents' home, but I needed a change of scenery.
yellow is my favorite color.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am currently watching a nature documentary on the national geographic channel.
I love watching nature documentaries! What kind of animals are you watching?
I am watching a documentary on polar bears!
Polar bears are amazing! I love how they can swim through the ice.
Me too! I also love how they can live in such cold temperatures.
I agree! They are truly amazing creatures.
I think my favorite animal is the cat. They are so cute and cuddly.
I love cats too! They are the best pets.
I agree! They are so low maintenance and they are always there to greet you when you come home.
That is so true! I love coming home to my cat after a long day at work.
Me too! They always know how to make me feel better.
I am glad we are both animal lovers!
Me too! It is always nice to meet someone who shares my love for animals
